title: 40 Bus southbound:Construction
description: NJ Transit Bus: due to Construction, Construction, southbound 40 Bus area of Kellogg St 290' E Of Corbin St (Newark) Until 11:59 PM on September 15,2025 Effective Monday, September 16, 2024, and continuing until Monday, September 15, 2025, Kellogg and Marlin streets will be closed between Corbin and Distribution streets due to long-term construction.  During this time, NJ TRANSIT Bus Route No. 40 will operate on a detour as follows:      Buses traveling toward Jersey Garden Mall will travel from Doremus Avenue and Distribution Street, continue on Distribution Street, right on Marlin Street, left on Port Street, bear right on Corbin Street, and then continue the regular route.     Buses traveling toward North Arlington will not be affected.    Bus stops will be lost and minor delays expected during this detour. The pedestrian tunnel will remain open to access the southbound platform and all points north of Metropark Station, as well as sidewalks along Middlesex Turnpike, Wood Avenue, and Lincoln Highway.  Please allow for extra travel time. We appreciate your patience during this adjustment.

description: NJ Transit Bus: due to Construction, Construction, southbound 40 Bus area of Kellogg St 290' E Of Corbin St (Newark) Until 11:59 PM on September 15,2025 Effective Monday, September 16, 2024, and continuing until Monday, September 15, 2025, Kellogg and Marlin streets will be closed between Corbin and Distribution streets due to long-term construction.  During this time, NJ TRANSIT Bus Route No. 40 will operate on a detour as follows:      Buses traveling toward Jersey Garden Mall will travel from Doremus Avenue and Distribution Street, continue on Distribution Street, right on Marlin Street, left on Port Street, bear right on Corbin Street, and then continue the regular route.     Buses traveling toward North Arlington will not be affected.    Bus stops will be lost and minor delays expected during this detour. Please read the above detour directions carefully, and allow for extra travel time.

During this time, NJ TRANSIT Bus Route No. 194 will operate on a detour as follows: Buses traveling toward PABT will travel from Main Street and Reeve Avenue, make a left onto Reeve Avenue, right on Oak Street, right on Union Avenue, left on Main Street, and then continue the regular route. Buses traveling toward Stockholm and West Milford will travel from Main Street and Union Avenue, make a right on Union Avenue, left onto Oak Street, left onto Reeve Avenue, right on Main Street, and then continue the regular route. Bus stops may be lost, and minor delays are expected during this detour.
